features: Simple UI to add your 30-day challenge; A daily prompt shown to log your practise session; Streaks displayed on the calendar for continuous motivation; Elegant UI to inspire you to capture & share your progress on social!; Simple dashboard to enter your monthly challenge; Pre-filled months, start & end dates for effortless setup; A daily prompt shown to log your practise session information; Check-in streaks displayed on the calendar for continuous motivation; Dashboard with progress stats shown for various challenges taken up in the entire year.
